Markdown
tiles.markdown:
# Davis Data Units (DDUs)

* Read more about DDUs [here](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/shortlink/davis-data-units)

## Included DDUs
* 1000 Metrics (525,600 DDUs) are included per Host Unit

## Metrics

* Each Metric data point = 0.001 DDU

* 1 Metric = 525.6 DDUs per Year

* 1 data point x 60 min x 24 hours x 365 days x 0.001 DDU weight = 525.6 DDUs per year, per metric.



## Logs
* One Log Entry = 0.0005 DDUs
* 1 DDU = 2000 Log Entries

## Serverless
* 1 AWS Lambda Function Invocation = 0.002 DDUs

* 1 DDU = 500 AWS Lambda Function Invocations
